nodes.text: House Miurani was one of the Chiss houses that operated during the time of the Cold War. Aristocra Saganu represented this house and was responsible for oversight of Zero Station on Hoth.

This family was mentioned in the dialogue options for the Imperial Agent class should they also be of the Chiss race. During the conversation, the Aristocra makes the player into a merit adoptive of House Miurani and represents the family in the galaxy.
